answers.question:
Question: What is the purpose of normalization in a database management system (DBMS)?
A) To increase data redundancy
B) To eliminate data anomalies
C) To enhance security features
D) To improve query execution speed  
Correct: B

Question: Which of the following is a characteristic of a relational database management system (RDBMS)?
A) It stores data in key-value pairs.
B) It uses tables to represent data and relationships.
C) It only supports non-structured data.
D) It requires explicit data type declaration for each column.  
Correct: B
answers.user_answer: It uses tables to represent data and relationships.
answers.correct_answer: B) It uses tables to represent data and relationships.
